data.title: Company Overview & News
data.meta_description: Sinopharm Group Co., Ltd. is a distributor of pharmaceutical and healthcare products and a value added supply chain service provider in the People's Republic
data.text:
Tyler Reddick’s Michigan Victory Shows 23XI Racing’s Growth

Tyler Reddick won Monday's Nascar Cup Series race at Michigan International Speedway. Now, 23XI Racing, owned by Michael Jordan and Denny Hamlin have a title contender.

IRS Issues Guidance On Retirement Plan Matches Based On Student Loan Payments

The match amount is calculated as if the employee contributed their loan amount to the plan even if they did not make any elective contributions.

‘Love Island’ Urges Viewers To Be Kind Ahead Of Reunion—As The Show’s Biggest Season Sparks Online Bullying

Some contestants from the latest edition of “Love Island USA,” a breakout season for the franchise, have urged fans to stop targeting the contestants online.

Apple Is ‘Poised To Win’ AI Wars, But The Market Already Knew That

Apple may indeed win the AI wars, but the market has already priced that payday in, say MoffettNathanson analysts. Investors may want to temper their enthusiasm.

Ukraine Is Trying To Double The Area Of Russia It Controls—By Destroying Bridges And Blocking Reinforcements

Ukrainian raids have dropped four bridges in four days: three of them big concrete spans.

What Time Does The DNC Start? Find Out When And How To Watch Day 1

The 2024 Democratic National Convention officially begins tonight. Find out the exact start time, the speaker lineup for Day 1, and how to watch the event.

George Santos Pleads Guilty To Wire Fraud And Identity Theft, Avoiding Trial—Here’s What To Know

The ousted lawmaker was accused of defrauding donors and lying about his finances, among other claims.

Chrystul Kizer Sentenced To 11 Years In Prison For Killing Sex Trafficker: What To Know About The Case

Chrystul Kizer was sentenced on Monday after a six-year legal battle in which she argued she was unable to be prosecuted for killing the man who sexually trafficked her under affirmative defense.

Additive Free Alliance Debuts, Seeking Transparency In Agave Spirits

Many agave spirits claim to be additive-free, but consumers didn’t have a way to confirm it. This new organization lets them know which brands truly stand by the claim.

Michael Keaton’s ‘Beetlejuice 2’ Return Came With One Unique Condition

"Beetlejuice Beetlejuice" star Michael Keaton says he had a certain condition that needed to be met for his character in the long-awaited sequel to the 1988 classic.

Atlanta Braves Challenge Auction Of Hank Aaron Items By Heritage

The Atlanta Braves insist that Heritage Auctions remove Hank Aaron memorabilia from April 8, 1974 because it has not been authenticated.

Jake Paul Reveals Massive Payout For Mike Tyson Fight

Jake Paul told the world his primary objectives for November 15, when he is scheduled to clash with boxing icon Mike Tyson, is to “KO a legend” and “make a bag.”

The Slumping Cleveland Guardians Have Hit A Speed Bump

No runs scored in their last 14 innings.

Nvidia-Led Rally Boosts S&P 500 To Best Stretch Of 2024

The S&P 500 is well on pace to register its eighth consecutive session in the green as the leading U.S. index.

Red Velvet Earns Their First Top 10 On One Of Billboard’s Most Competitive Charts

Red Velvet’s new EP Cosmic debuts on this week’s Top Album Sales chart at No. 6. It's the first top 10 on Billboard’s ranking of the bestselling titles in the U.S. for the band.
